title: "India’s Presidency brought voice of Global South into heart of G20 discourse: Vice President Dhankhar"
excerpt: "Vice President Jagdeep Dhankhar on Thursday said India’s G20 Presidency brought the voice of the Global South into the heart of G20 discourse. He said this is the game changer in world polity. “India’s Presidency has brought the voice of the global south into the heart of G20 discourse."
